actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 94-51.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D75-86) relating to the Department of Interior, Bureau of Reclamation which is proposed by the President in his message of October 31, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Expresses the disapproval of the House of Representatives to the deferral of budget authority (D75-86) relating to the Upper Colorado River Storage Project of the Department of the Interior, Bureau of Reclamation proposed by the President's in his message of October 31, 1974, transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of certain budget authority (D75-86) relating to the Department of Interior, Bureau of Reclamation which is proposed by the President in his message of October 31, 1974, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
